title: Given 2 losses during promos even though I only lost one game

embed.description: Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

body: When I played promotions for silver 4 today I was given a loss even though I was on a hot streak and lost only one game. I have linked my op.gg account as proof and I have compiled together images explaining and proving that I was given a random loss. Thank you for your time ladies and gents.

replies.body: Ahhhh I see what happened. It doesn't look like op.gg is showing you the full match history, since there was a game where you queue dodged as soon as your miniseries started. Keep in mind that [**dodging games in a series**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q2) will always count as a loss. Also, remember that op.gg isn't hosted by Riot, so their data can be skewed or missing elements.
